results.title: [Increase of arterial pressure caused by generic atenolol].
results.text_hl: [@<m>DISEASE_Intracranial_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019586 @@@Increase of arterial pressure@@@ caused by generic @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@].

results.title: Adrenalectomy abolishes antagonism of alpha-adrenoceptor-mediated hypotension by a beta-blocker in conscious rats.
results.text_hl: The injection of @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ or @CHEMICAL_ICI_118551 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C026777 @@@ICI 118,551@@@ in Groups I, II and III, respectively, caused a small @<m>DISEASE_Intracranial_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019586 @@@increase in MAP@@@ and a small, but not significant, decrease in plasma @CHEMICAL_Norepinephrine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009638 @@@noradrenaline@@@ concentrations. 3.

citations.NLM: Tabrizchi R, Pang CC. Adrenalectomy abolishes antagonism of alpha-adrenoceptor-mediated hypotension by a beta-blocker in conscious rats. Br J Pharmacol. 1990 Oct;101(2):358-62. PMID: 1979508
citations.BibTeX: @article{1979508, title={Adrenalectomy abolishes antagonism of alpha-adrenoceptor-mediated hypotension by a beta-blocker in conscious rats.}, author={Tabrizchi R and Pang CC}, journal={Br J Pharmacol}, volume={101}, number={2}, pages={358-62}}

results.title: Cardiovascular effects of ghrelin antagonist in conscious rats.
results.text_hl: Sympathetic blockade of alpha-adrenoreceptors with @CHEMICAL_Phentolamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010646 @@@phentolamine@@@ (3 mg/kg, s.c.) and simultaneous antagonism of beta(1)-adrenoreceptors with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (10 mg/kg, s.c.) abolished the @<m>DISEASE_Intracranial_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019586 @@@increase in MAP@@@ and HR induced by GhA (4 mg/kg, s.c.).

citations.NLM: Vlasova MA, Järvinen K, Herzig KH. Cardiovascular effects of ghrelin antagonist in conscious rats. Regul Pept. 2009 Aug 7;156(1-3):72-6. PMID: 19426765
citations.BibTeX: @article{19426765, title={Cardiovascular effects of ghrelin antagonist in conscious rats.}, author={Vlasova MA and Järvinen K and Herzig KH}, journal={Regul Pept}, volume={156}, number={1-3}, pages={72-6}}
